name: ImageUtils
short: A cog that allows you to edit images
description: This cog allows users to edit images using various commands within discord. This is currently a WIP and only supports upscaling and downscaling
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data persistently.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing ImageUtils!
Please report any bugs/log output in *#support_other-cogs* on the cog support server (https://discord.gg/GET4DVk).
author: crayyy_zee
